Gérard Hérold https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%A9rard_H%C3%A9rold 0 Gérard Hérold (Mulhouse, 10 September 1939 - Paris, 19 August 1993) was a French actor, appearing in several films, TV series and on theatre. Gérard_Hérold ( Mulhouse , 10_September_1939 - Paris , 19_August_1993 ) was a_French_actor , appearing in several_films , TV_series and on theatre .
